choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Here is a balanced and delicious meal plan for you without the specified ingredients:
Breakfast:

1. Overnight oats with chia seeds (use dairy-free milk)
2. Fresh fruit salad with honey substitute, such as maple syrup or agave nectar

Lunch:

1. Grilled vegetable wrap with avocado spread and a side of mixed greens
2. Roasted chickpeas for added crunch
3. A refreshing dairy-free beverage, such as coconut water or almond milk

Dinner:

1. Baked salmon with lemon herb seasoning (use garlic-infused oil substitute)
2. Sautéed mushrooms and spinach with a gluten-free pasta (use dairy-free cheese alternative)
3. A side of quinoa or brown rice for added nutrition
4. Dairy-free dressing on the side for extra flavor

Snacks:

1. Roasted nuts substitute, such as sunflower seeds or pumpkin seeds
2. Fresh fruit or a dairy-free yogurt alternative with added fresh fruits and granola (use honey substitute)
